section.name: Features
section.p:
The key features of EasyConf are:
Usage of easy to remember conventions to simplify configuring applications
Component based configuration (for example for portlets and portals
Support for multiple environments (development, integration, preproduction, production, etc)

ol.li: Support for reloading of configuration (in progress, scheduled for v. 0.8)
Taglib to retrieve properties from JSPs
Taglib to retrieve the configuration object (in progress, scheduled for v. 0.8)
Servlet and struts action to refresh the configuration (in progress, scheduled for v. 0.8)
Typed properties (automatic conversion to numbers, lists, boolean, etc)
Access to system properties. It can also be viewed as being able to override property values through a system property
Support for loading classes from a class name specified in a proprety
Support for configuring multiple environments (devel, production, preproduction, etc)
Special support for multicomponent environments (p.e. portlets and portals)
The XML format is described using digester rules

section.p: For more information about this features check the Javadoc summary of EasyConf
